title: Archery
content:
High Ground Rules and have Disadvantage if you are within 1.5m of an enemy.

How to unlock Archery

Archery can be acquired by

Fighter (Lvl 1) Ranger Lvl 2

Archery Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here This does not affect attacks with thrown weapons.
